website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, easily spreadable tanning lotion that keeps your skin looking soft and vibrant.
pros: Easily spreads for an even tan
cons: It is messier to use than some of the other products listed here

website_summaries.verdict: You may like the way this product feels and looks, if you are OK with a lotion that has a strong scent and may require a little clean up after using it.
pros: Has a smooth consistency that feels fairly lightweight on the skin
Produces a nice glow that is buildable
Looks natural on most skin tones
cons: Some users complained that the scent is overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Been using for 30+ years!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. I did prefer the original formula without the fig but have adjusted to it after the last couple years. Be aware this should be used sparingly and mixed with your favorite face creme. Always was hands after. I let it dry a bit as it is very moist before using makeup over it. It give a great glow with no makeup necessary as well, just some lip gloss and you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: The coloring is nice but I won't buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: The coloring is nice but I won't buy this product again. The smell is so strong I have to wash my sheets after one night with it on. For those who don't know, there is typically an eventual odor associated with self tanners. That's not what I'm talking about. The lotion smells like coconut or something but it is very strong. I'm guessing it was added to help mask the self tanner smell but it has made it so much worse. As I said, despite rave reviews by my friends using "the old?" product, I will probably not be able to get through my first order. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Che N Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After using this lotion for 3 weeks nearly every day, I haven't noticed too much difference in my color. Overall, I'm not very happy, but perhaps this would be good for legs only. I will be coming back to Clarins drops that you mix with your own moisturizer as they achieve results much faster and look very natural when used on face, neck, and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Liliya
